Class AbstractDataRenderer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.fx.scene.renderer.AbstractDataRenderer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the data to render
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataRenderer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DayOfWeekRenderer, FormatterDataRenderer, LocalDateDayOfMonthRenderer, LocalizerRenderer, MonthRenderer, ObjectRenderer, YearRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractDataRenderer<T>
extends Object
implements DataRenderer<T>
    An abstract base implementation of DataRenderer.

    puce
